title: Fire safety
brief_description: A summary of some basic fire prevention methods aimed at school children. Advice is given on the best kind of matches to use, what to do in case of a gas leak, how to act in case of a fire - calling the fire department or sounding an alarm - how to treat minor burns etc. The advice is aided by little re-enactments involving children demonstrating the right methods.
